thread.title: Disney Parks After Dark: PizzeRizzo Lights Up The Night
thread.title_full: Disney Parks After Dark: PizzeRizzo Lights Up The Night

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Parks After Dark: PizzeRizzo Lights Up The Night
text:
Tonight’s “After Dark” image was snapped at PizzeRizzo , the first Muppets-themed restaurant to open at Disney’s Hollywood Studios . This two-story quick-service eatery dishes up personal-sized pizza pies and other Italian favorites like meatball subs, cannoli and tiramisu.
The interior theming is, of course, full of Muppets fun and features décor chosen by Rizzo, plus some special touches from his extended family and friends. Head to the second floor for a peek at Rizzo’s Deluxe Supreme Banquet Hall, where there’s a wedding reception already in progress.
PizzeRizzo is open daily for lunch and dinner at the park.
